participant_abstract.sent: The meeting went mostly to plan.
The structure of the meeting was not made clear at the start but was followed in the end.
It was obvious that the team was disappointed at the cutbacks required to bring the product in on budget but there was little that could be done about it.
Sacrifices had to be made and it was put forward that the cutbacks should be to the structure rather than the interface.

participant_decisions.sent: Changes from rubber to plastic, single curve rather than double curve.
The removal of the RC locator.

participant_problems.sent: Few problems, mostly stemming from what to do about cutbacks.
It became clear we also hadn't confirmed what the market the product was being aimed at.
